task.title: WSP Header Primitive Encoding
task.shortdesc: TWspPrimitiveEncoder allows encoding of header values. This encodes the input using various WSP encoding methods as follows: TWspPrimitiveEncoder is used to convert data into binary strings.

info.p: ShortInt() encodes the TUint8 parameter value.

stepresult.p: If the input value is greater that 127, it returns 0.

info.p: LongIntL() encodes the TUint32 parameter value.
UintVarL() encodes the TUint32 parameter value.
